#summary Source code repository access

= Repositories =

Since version 0.5 the grails-jaxrs sources (including the full project history) have been moved to a new [http://github.com/krasserm/grails-jaxrs GitHub respository]. Branches and tags up to version 0.4 are still available in the project's old [http://code.google.com/p/grails-jaxrs/source/browse/ Subversion repository].

=Command-line access=

To clone the grails-jaxrs repository run

{{{
git clone git://github.com/krasserm/grails-jaxrs.git
}}}

from the command line. Developers with read/write access to the public repository should run

{{{
git clone git@github.com:krasserm/grails-jaxrs.git
}}}
